name: Thompson et al., Appellants, v. Philadelphia Transportation Co.

judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearns and Jones, JJ.
parties: Thompson et al., Appellants, v. Philadelphia Transportation Co.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The judgment is affirmed upon the opinion of Judge Flood.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: D. J. Farage, with him Joseph S. Lord, 3rd, and Richter, Lord & Farage, for appellants.
Marshall A. Coyne, with him Bernard J. O’Connell, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Thompson et al., Appellants, v. Philadelphia Transportation Co.
Argued April 17, 1947.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearns and Jones, JJ.
D. J. Farage, with him Joseph S. Lord, 3rd, and Richter, Lord & Farage, for appellants.
Marshall A. Coyne, with him Bernard J. O’Connell, for appellee.
May 26, 1947:
